14.content:
Your name is Jake, and you had been a hit target for all the bullies in your high school for years, mainly because of your tendancy for good grades and being the teacher's pet.
You wanted nothing more than to get them back for all the farts that you had inhaled and the logs you had seen. Their were two of the worst bullies in the school aiming for you as well: Jax and Harrison.

Jax was a tall, Spanish guy with dark hair and a nice tan. His favourite form of torture was making you lick his ass while letting bubbly presents fly out.

Harrison was a blonde American, average height and sandy blonde hair. He had humiliated you by letting out dozens of monstrous farts in your face at a time.

When you find this power, you wonder. Jax? Or Harrison?
14.title: A Teenage Boy/Girl in High School

14111.content:
You felt a little sorry for Jax, knowing that he was probably in the pits of hell down there. He was quite a nice guy to his friends, you knew. Not to you, but his friends. You stood up but kept him in firm grip "What?"
The older boy took frantic gulps of fresh air and gasped. "I... I'm sorry for... This. Man, I didn't know how much you suffered..."

A wave if guilt crashed over you, but also anger. This guy had farted on you and sharted in your face and made you lick his crack! Now he was begging for mercy and /apoligising/?
14111.title: "Have mercy!"

You settled on Jax again, positioning his nose up your crack, and you felt pressure build up in your stomach, travel down into your intestines, and brutally fight your arse to get out. You didn't fight, and let the bubbly monster pop out, and let out a wet, squelching encore. You were on a roll now, farting and farting. Some loud, some soft, some wet. And Jax kept struggling for freedom, and air. You wouldn't let him have it.

info.brief_description: You wake up one day to find that you can make anyone who bullied you into your butt slave.
info.description:
You are a child, teenager, or adult who has trouble with bullying. As you wake up on a Monday morning, you find out that you now have the ability to make anyone who bullied you into your personal butt slave. How your power works, as well as what you use your butt slave for is entirely up to you. Have fun.

Rules:
1. The focus of this interactive is butts and everything associated with them.
2. No sex in chapters with children or teens. The only exception being chapters that involve people who are 18 or 19.
3. The chapter you chose is the demographic you use. EX: If you choose the elementary school chapter, the characters you use must elementary school children.
4. One paragraph minimum. (A paragraph is 8-11 sentences.)
5. You can choose between shrink, transformation, or tying down.
6. Because you can shrink people, butt crushing is a thing. However, no character may die.
